attributes.action: recognise the thousands of Freemasons in the UK and honour them for their many contributions to society throughout our history.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To recognise that freemasonry, which was founded in this country, has set an example of high moral standards and charity for all people; that members of freemasonry, both individually and as an organisation, continue to make invaluable contributions of their time and energy in service to the United Kingdom; that freemasons continue to provide a high level of charitable relief to both masons and non-masons alike; that freemasonry is deserving of formal recognition of their long history of care-giving for the citizenry and their example of high moral standards and integrity.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
